Indonesia Will Not Leave BRICS Despite US Tariff Threat
body: Indonesia says it won’t leave BRICS even if the U.S. imposes a 42% tariff, as Airlangga leads talks to defuse trade tensions.

title: Airlangga Reports Positive Talks With US on Looming Tariffs
body: Indonesia is pushing talks and energy deals with the US to avert Trump’s looming 32% tariffs on Indonesian exports starting August 1.

title: Trump Tariff Countdown: $82.3 Billion Cost Looms for US Employers
